Contribution Guidelines¶

Code Standards¶

  • PEP8: Follow the PEP8 style guide for Python code.

  • Commit Messages: Write clear, concise, and descriptive commit messages to explain the changes made.

Submitting Changes¶

  1. Fork the Repository: Create a fork of the repository to work on your changes.

  2. Create a Feature Branch: Create a new branch for your feature or bug fix.

  3. Submit a Pull Request: Once your changes are ready, submit a pull request for review.

Issue Reporting¶

  • GitHub Issues: Use GitHub Issues to report bugs or suggest new features.
